notFound.title: Signal Lost
notFound.heading: The Void Has Consumed This Page
notFound.description: You've ventured too far into the unknown. The coordinates you're looking for have been redacted by the {bureaucracy} or lost in the {neon}.
notFound.markMessage: JOIN US... BECOME PART OF THE SHIP...
notFound.krampMessage: BEHAVIOR DEVIATION DETECTED. COMPLIANCE CHECK INITIATED.
notFound.clickSecretMessage: MARK SEES YOU... JOIN THE SHIP...

meta.title: Chronometer Terminal | Fables Monster Studio
meta.description: Digital countdown timer with terminal interface for tabletop gaming sessions.

footer.tagline: Independent tabletop RPG content creation studio
footer.copyright: © {year} Fables Monster Studio. All rights reserved.

team.name: Stepan Kulikov
team.bio: Keeps the stories weird, the deadlines (mostly) real, and the studio moving forward.

team.name: Tatiana Bond
team.bio: Turns raw text and art into publications that look and read well.

team.name: Zlata (jamakuci) Ignatova
team.bio: Draws the creatures, locations, and everything in between.

team.name: Stanislav DariDai
team.bio: Writes the music. Sets the mood. Makes you check your headphones twice.

team.name: Allecks
team.bio: Builds the website, the VTT modules, and whatever else needs code.

team.name: Dan Tarkov
team.bio: Designs game mechanics and breaks them until they work.

about.title: ABOUT US
about.subtitle: Meet the team behind Fables Monster Studio
about.metaDescription: Meet the team behind Fables Monster Studio. We make horror, sci-fi, and weird adventures for tabletop RPGs.
about.rosterDescription: The people behind the adventures, the art, and the sound.

values.title: Quality First
values.description: We don't rush releases, preferring to create products we can be proud of

values.title: Human Creativity
values.description: We believe in human art and writing. No AI generation in our final products.

values.title: Community Driven
values.description: We listen to our players and build what the community needs

contact.title: CONTACT
contact.metaTitle: Contact - Get in Touch with Fables Monster Studio
contact.metaDescription: Get in touch with Fables Monster Studio. Collaborations, questions, or just say hi. Find us on Discord or drop a message.
contact.heroDescription: Collaborations, release questions, partnership ideas. Pick a channel or use the form below.

form.title: SEND MESSAGE
form.name: NAME
form.success: Message sent successfully! We'll get back to you soon.
form.error: Error sending message. Please try again or email us directly at info@fables.monster
form.tip: Tip: Your message will be sent directly to our team. You can also email us directly at

projects.metaDescription: Explore our tabletop RPG adventures and digital experiences. From sci-fi horror to cyberpunk mysteries.
projects.description: Explore our tabletop RPG adventures and digital experiences

joinCommunity.title: JOIN THE COMMUNITY
joinCommunity.description: Follow our development and become part of the Fables Monster community

lostMark.description: A science fiction horror adventure for the role-playing game Mothership RPG. Your team encounters the wreckage of the tourist yacht Silk Star, which disappeared 217 years ago.

holidayAudit.description: A Christmas Eve gone catastrophically wrong in deep space. Can you cleanse your record before the system wipes you?

hellishBureaucracy.defaultTagline: Navigate the administrative nightmare of Hell
